snippet.title: BrainHotelTrailer 1
snippet.description:
In this Comic Book inspired Pont & Click adventure, you play as delivery man, Ed Arnold, who has the misfortune of delivering a package to the Brain Hotel on the eve of their annual super-villain convention. He soon stumbles across a sinister plot that threatens the lives of countless hotel patrons and potentially the entire world!

STEAM: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2648510/Brain_Hotel_Remodeled/

ITCH:
https://pinheadgames.itch.io/brain-hotel-remodeled
